description:
We are made of body, mind and spirit and we need to take care of all three of them in order to keep balance in life. We usually forget about our soul and just take care of our mind and our body therefore I try to meditate as much as possible since we are souls and should take care of our spiritual progress in the first place. But beside meditating I enjoy gardening, watching a good movie, spending time with my friends, go for a walk etc.

I am looking for someone with a pure soul and a big heart. Someone who understands that this life was given to us with a special purpose and we shouldn't waste it.
